message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth the investment.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $18,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000. Can you meet me at this price?
